review: Had a very good experience, Dr. Pravalli is very polite and friendly. Explained the root cause of the tooth pain and gel issue. Overall Happy with the consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Overall good experience. Doctor explained the issue and available treatment solutions very clearly and decision was left to us to decide on the type of treatment.

review:
I had a good experience with the Glow Dental Clinic.
The Doctors were good with proper professional knowledge.
The Clinic was very clean and hygienic with modern equipment.
Proper communication was provided for each appointment.
